formattedAddress: 45 W 8th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 45 W 8th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I have never CORRECTED a masseuse and this experience warranted that. From pressing directly on the spine, to running his bone over my bones. Using literally one technique and pace for my entire body - to slathering lotion on me to the point that I asked him to stop. It was a bizarre experience and I dont understand how they can afford an entire storefront.

originalText.text: the quality of the foot reflexology was definitely good. But the negative is that it is so loud in there it's impossible to relax. The staff talked the entire time and they allow the customers to have mindless chatter. Do not come here if you're really trying to relax. Also they offered a Groupon it was actually more expensive than their regular prices. Call First for a price

originalText.text: This place lacks some hygiene, the massage for my friend seemed good but mine was not very professional. Mainly I have never seen massage with towels, more than 30 minutes with towel before they put oil towards the end.  the bathroom is dirty, papers on the floor.  They demand that you should give more than 10 dollars of tip, it is assumed that the tip is earned for good service, but if the service is not good you have not earned anything, definitely will not return. The only good thing was the use of the hot stones.

originalText.text: I just love my w102nd street location they're the best.

text.text: I just love my w102nd street location they're the best.

originalText.text: I made an appointment at their Chelsea location and came there for 10.30 am appointment and the door was closed. Both their phone numbers did not even accept voicemails. No answers, no explanations, no apologies. Very poor service.
